src:
宇野、ＳＰ４位…女子は樋口５位・坂本６位

02 Nov 2019, 03:00



男子ショートプログラムで演技する宇野昌磨（１日）＝時事

　フィギュアスケートのグランプリ（ＧＰ）シリーズ第３戦、フランス杯は１日、グルノーブルで開幕し、男子ショートプログラム（ＳＰ）で今季ＧＰ初戦の宇野昌磨（トヨタ自動車）はジャンプで２度転倒し、７９・０５点で４位だった。世界選手権２連覇中のネーサン・チェン（米）が１０２・４８点でトップ。女子ＳＰは樋口新葉（明大）が６４・７８点で５位。坂本花織（シスメックス）は６位、白岩優奈（関大ク）は７位だった。シニアＧＰデビュー戦で１６歳のアリョーナ・コストルナヤ（ロシア）が７６・５５点で首位に立ち、平昌五輪金メダルのアリーナ・ザギトワ（同）は７４・２４点で２位発進。（時事）
text:
Uno, SP 4th place ... Women's Higuchi 5th place, Sakamoto 6th place

02 Nov 2019, 03:00



Masao Uno acting on a men's short program (1st) = current affairs

The 3rd round of the figure skating Grand Prix (GP) series, the French Cup opened in Grenoble on the 1st, and Masao Uno (Toyota Motor), the first GP of the season in the Men's Short Program (SP), fell twice in a jump, 79・ 4th place with 05 points. Nathan Chen (USA), who has won two consecutive world championships, is the top at 102.48 points. The female SP is Shinba Higuchi (Meidai), who ranked 5th with 64.78 points. Kaori Sakamoto (Sysmex) was sixth and Yuna Shiraiwa (Seki University) was seventh. 16-year-old Ariona Kostrnaya (Russia) took the lead with 76.55 points in the senior GP debut match, and Pyeongchang Olympic gold medal Arena Zagitowa (same) took second place with 74.24 points. (Current events)
